name: simple-vdom
description: A simple virtual DOM, not made for performance but for learning

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/jsx.d.ts dist/jsx.d.ts && terser -c -m toplevel,reserved=['vdom','render'] --mangle-props regex=/domNode\|classInstance\|type\|vNode\|ctor\|parentElement\|internalRender\|nodeType\|nodeValue\|attribute\|value\|intrinsicType\|textValue\|renderNode\|vdomKey/ -o dist/index.min.js --source-map filename=dist/input.js.map dist/index.js

author: Alan Lawrey
